entry.title: Removing channel reserve for mobile wallet users
entry.summary:
In a recent email, the sender mentions that they have reviewed some implementations, specifically mentioning "lnd," and note that it currently checks that the reserve is at least the dust limit. They consider this to be reasonable. However, they point out that with the proposed protocol update, this will need to change. The sender expresses their anticipation for the Blip.
Overall, the email highlights the need for adjustments in the reserve requirement due to an upcoming protocol update. The sender acknowledges the current implementation's consideration of the dust limit but emphasizes the necessity for modification moving forward.
